node.statement: (HS-DER-rev) d/dt E_beta(tau(t)||rho(t)) = Tr[Q_beta(t) (1_A x delta_B - beta delta_AB)] at generic beta (no zero eigenvalue of tau(t) - beta rho(t)), where Q_beta(t) := 1{tau(t) - beta rho(t) > 0} is the reverse spectral projector. This is the reverse analogue of node 1.5 (HS-DER-fwd), obtained by the same off-block-diagonal argument with roles of rho(t) and tau(t) swapped.
